participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and active, enjoys participating in competitive activities and has a passion for animals.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male. i have children and dogs.
